Join Our Family
At Jim ‘N Nick’s, we love Bar-B-Q. We love preparing it, we love serving it, we really love eating it, and we love the way it brings people together. It’s good for your heart, it’s good for your soul, and it’s a darn good reason for us to get out of bed every morning. If you are friendly, dependable, with a strong work ethic, passion for great food and desire to deliver an amazing guest experience, we want to meet you!
Current Opportunities
We Offer:
Competitive Pay
Flexible schedules
Discounted Meals
A work environment that is upbeat, exciting, and fun
Opportunity for Advancement
Health Benefits
401(k) Plan
Team Member Assistance Fund

The Jim 'N Nick's BBQ Family Fund
The Jim ’N Nick’s family is deeply rooted in the belief that none of us can succeed without all of us and as part of our commitment to our BBQ Family, Jim ’N Nick’s has established the BBQ Family Fund (BFF).
BBQ Family Fund
